sub_heading: Helping our clients outcompete with technology

title: Unlock the power of AI
description: QuantumBlack, AI by McKinsey helps organizations transform faster, innovate smarter, and anticipate the future, unlocking the power of AI to reinvent themselves from the ground up.

title: Invent and scale new businesses
description: Leap by McKinsey experts work with established organizations to imagine, build, and scale new businesses that thrive. We arm our clients’ teams with the software, tools, and capabilities they’ll need to succeed on their own.
